bibl.title: Ben cao gang mu dictionary Vol1

sense.def: Pathological Condition of a red kernel-type swelling without a head developing on the head, in the face, or at the throat. The tumor itself does not ache or itch, but is accompanied by fever with an aversion to cold and pain affecting head and body. Wai ke jing yi 外科精義 Fj: 原 夫此疾，古無方論，世俗通為丹瘤 , “In ancient times there existed no recipe discourse for this ailment. It was commonly called ‘ vermilion tumor ’”.
